channel.title: [PI] How do I clear the quest tab of RS quests? [PI]
channel.description:
Title says it all, using PI Exion base and I want to remove the quests from the quest tab so I can put things for commands in there. Looked in client.java and playerassistant.java and couldn't find the name of the quests so I could remove them.
Please help.

item.title: [PI] How do I clear the quest tab of RS quests? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:4, topic:382896”][quote author=youdunce2 link=topic=478681.msg3504268#msg3504268 date=1298009820]
search in client.java for a quest name and delete it out.
[/quote]

This guy is funny.

I would look for these files
runefdx\iHybrid Server\Data\Quests
q1p1.txt

Or this
runefdx\iHybrid Server\bin\Quests
q1p1.txt

or this client.java

[code]
//Will work on the quest tab tomorrow
getPA().sendFrame126("", 13136);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 673);
getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Information:", 7332);
//getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Username:", 7333);
//getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@PKP:",7334);
//getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Quick Buy", 7336);
getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Hybrid Set @gre@450k", 7383);
getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Melee Set @gre@310k", 7339);
getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Barrage Runes @gre@200k", 7338);
getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Vengance Runes @gre@100k", 7340);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7346);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7341);

getPA().sendFrame126("", 7337);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7343);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7335);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7344);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7345);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7347);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 7348);

/*Members Quests*/

getPA().sendFrame126("", 7352);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 12129);
